pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Jinja RenderBase functinos to use Jinja2Here we use the `jinja_render` module, as example, from `robinson_code` repo# ExampleThis example is from [muestreo-aves-marinas-ipbc](https://bitbucket.org/IslasGECI/muestreo-aves-marinas-ipbc/src/43dba1b46b492393baa508fbbb73d3ff9ade42be/Makefile#lines-946)``` shtyper jinja_render run \--report-name="time_series_results_section" \--summary-path="tests/data/mergulo_punta.json"```
